mapper.select: select * from message where reservation_code=#{reservationCode} order by write_at desc limit 1;
select * from message where reservation_code=#{reservationCode} order by write_at asc
mapper.update: update message set read_flag=true where id=#{id};
mapper.insert: insert into message (reservation_code, recipient_id, writer_id, content) values (#{reservationCode}, #{recipientId}, #{writerId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select * from message where recipient_id = #{recipientId} order by write_at desc
